title: Easy pizza rolls
ingredients: ['6 crusty bread rolls', 'butter for the bread', 'For the topping', '250g cooked ham, diced', '1 small onion, diced', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1 pickled gherkin, diced', '1 (200g) tin mushrooms, diced', '2 mild chillies, diced small', 'pizza seasoning to taste', '250g Gruyere or Emmental cheese, grated']
